entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %

Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
